title: Zakir Hussain Fayazi – 2022 NEC Candidate Statement
author: admin
summary: The candidate statement from Zakir Hussain Fayazi.
content:
**Candidate Statement**
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant

Being a member of the party since 2017, it will be an honour to put my further efforts to help the party reaching their goal through this position.

Best regards,
